body_html:
Thanks. I'd like to be able to access an HDF5 file on an S3 bucket. This way I don't have to download the entire file at once. I've managed to accomplish this with goofys mounting the S3 bucket as a local directory. Do you think your code could be used in the same way with h5py? Thanks. -Tony
…

body:
Thanks.

I'd like to be able to access an HDF5 file on an S3 bucket. This way I
don't have to download the entire file at once.

I've managed to accomplish this with goofys mounting the S3 bucket as a
local directory. Do you think your code could be used in the same way with
h5py?

Thanks.
-Tony
